metadata.title: CVE-2018-20198 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in ifilter_bank oflibfaad/filtbank.c in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. Thevulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, whichleads to denial of service because adding to windowed output is mishandledin the LONG_START_SEQUENCE case.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20198` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.8.8-3ubuntu3
libfaad2 - 2.8.8-3ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faad2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.8-3ubuntu3').
